amendment.description: Amendment sought to direct the President to end the permanent basing of the 2nd Cavalry Regiment (2CR) in Vilseck, Germany and return the Brigade Combat Team currently stationed in Europe to the United States without permanent replacement.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 37 printed in Part B of House Report 113-108 to direct the President to end the permanent basing of the 2nd Cavalry Regiment (2CR) in Vilseck, Germany and return the Brigade Combat Team currently stationed in Europe to the United States without permanent replacement.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Coffman amendment (A023) Failed by recorded vote: 110 - 313 (Roll no. 235).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Coffman amendment (A023) Failed by recorded vote: 110 - 313 (Roll no. 235).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A023) offered by Mr. Coffman.
